original: / ci ste de nyid dang gzhan nyid du brjod du med pa nyid kyi phyir brjod du med pa yin no zhe na 'o na ni ji skad du brjod par bya ba de skad du brjod par gyis shig / gang gcig ma yin zhing gcig ma yin pa
analyzed: / ci ste de nyid dang gzhan nyid du brjod du med pa nyid kyi phyir brjod du med pa yin no zhe na 'o na ni ji skad du brjod par bya ba de skad du brjod par gyis shig / gang gcig ma yin zhing gcig ma yin pa
translated: But if it is inexpressible because it is inexpressible as either the same or different, then you should say exactly what it is that you are trying to say.

original: yang ma yin pa'i dngos po de lta bu ni srid par bya ba yang mi nus so //
analyzed: yang ma yin pa'i dngos po de lta bu ni srid par bya ba yang mi nus so //
translated: But a thing that is neither one nor many cannot be made to exist.

original: de'i phyir de ltar rang gis dam bcas pa'i gang gi don khong du chud par mi nus pas ko rtsod pa ga la rnyed /
analyzed: de'i phyir de ltar rang gis dam bcas pa'i gang gi don khong du chud par mi nus pas ko rtsod pa ga la rnyed /
translated: Therefore, since you cannot understand the meaning of your own thesis, how can you find fault with others?

original: gtan tshigs 'di yang dam bca' ba las tha dad pa zhig bsgrub bya'i don go bar byed dam /
analyzed: gtan tshigs 'di yang dam bca' ba las tha dad pa zhig bsgrub bya'i don go bar byed dam /
translated: And does this reason make the meaning of the probandum understood as something different from the thesis,

original: tha mi dad pa zhig yin grang /
analyzed: tha mi dad pa zhig yin grang /
translated: or as something non-different?

original: gal te tha dad na ni de tha dad pa nyid kyi phyir go bar mi byed de ;
analyzed: gal te tha dad na ni de tha dad pa nyid kyi phyir go bar mi byed de ;
translated: If it is different, then it does not make the meaning understood because it is different,

original: tha dad pa gzhan bzhin no //
analyzed: tha dad pa gzhan bzhin no //
translated: like another different thing.

original: ci ste tha mi dad na /
analyzed: ci ste tha mi dad na /
translated: But if it is non-different,

original: de lta na yang dam bca' ba'i rang gi bdag nyid ltar go bar mi byed do //
analyzed: de lta na yang dam bca' ba'i rang gi bdag nyid ltar go bar mi byed do //
translated: then it does not make the meaning understood, just like the thesis itself.

original: gal te 'di ni ltag chod zhig go zhe na /
analyzed: gal te 'di ni ltag chod zhig go zhe na /
translated: If you say that this is a reductio,

original: lan yod na ni ltag chod du 'gyur ba zhig na de yang nga la gdab par mi nus te /
analyzed: lan yod na ni ltag chod du 'gyur ba zhig na de yang nga la gdab par mi nus te /
translated: then the response is not a reductio, because you cannot apply it to me.

original: gang dang gang smras pa de dang de gnyi ga la grub pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang dang gang smras pa de dang de gnyi ga la grub pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: For whatever is said, in both cases there is no establishment.

original: gang zhig gnyi ga la 'grub par 'gyur ba dag gis ni ci yang khas ma blangs so //
analyzed: gang zhig gnyi ga la 'grub par 'gyur ba dag gis ni ci yang khas ma blangs so //
translated: And those who would establish both cases do not accept anything.

original: ci khyod la thams cad med dam zhe na /
analyzed: ci khyod la thams cad med dam zhe na /
translated: Do you not have anything at all?

original: re zhig thams cad nyid brjod par bya dgos te /
analyzed: re zhig thams cad nyid brjod par bya dgos te /
translated: First, everything must be stated,

original: de nas de yod pa'am med pa zhes bya ba der 'gyur ba thams cad ces bya ba'i dngos po 'di ci zhig / ci ste khyod kyang med dam /
analyzed: de nas de yod pa'am med pa zhes bya ba der 'gyur ba thams cad ces bya ba'i dngos po 'di ci zhig / ci ste khyod kyang med dam /
translated: and then it could be said that it exists or does not exist. But what is this thing called ‚Äúeverything‚Äù?üîΩIf you do not exist,

original: ci khyod yod pa zhig gam /
analyzed: ci khyod yod pa zhig gam /
translated: then do you exist?

original: yod na ni re zhig bdag sgrubs shig / bdag dang gzhan dang gnyi ga dang rgyu med pa las rnam par dpyad pa na khyod la yod pa nyid med la /
analyzed: yod na ni re zhig bdag sgrubs shig / bdag dang gzhan dang gnyi ga dang rgyu med pa las rnam par dpyad pa na khyod la yod pa nyid med la /
translated: If you exist, then first establish yourself. When you are analyzed in terms of self, other, both, or causelessly, you do not exist.

original: de bzhin du rgyu la yang yod pa dang / med pa dang dus gsum du yang mi srid pas ji ltar khyod kyi yod pa nyid du 'gyur /
analyzed: de bzhin du rgyu la yang yod pa dang / med pa dang dus gsum du yang mi srid pas ji ltar khyod kyi yod pa nyid du 'gyur /
translated: Likewise, the cause also does not exist, does not not exist, and is not possible in the three times. So how could it be existent for you?

original: khyod la 'jig rten pa dang 'gal bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: khyod la 'jig rten pa dang 'gal bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: You contradict the world.

original: bdag dang 'jig rten mi 'gal te /üîΩ'di ltar bdag ni khyod la yang rnam pa gzhan du zhugs pa /
analyzed: bdag dang 'jig rten mi 'gal te / 'di ltar bdag ni khyod la yang rnam pa gzhan du zhugs pa /
translated: We do not contradict the world.

original: 'jig rten la yang rnam pa gzhan du yin no //üîΩkhyod ni mkhas par rlom @105a * //
analyzed: 'jig rten la yang rnam pa gzhan du yin no // khyod ni mkhas par rlom @105a * //
translated: Because the self is conceived in one way by you and in another way by the world.

original: pa zhig ste /
analyzed: pa zhig ste /
translated: You are conceited about your knowledge,

original: bdag gis tshig 'di lta bus de'i mkhas par rlom pa nyid de sel bar byed do //
analyzed: bdag gis tshig 'di lta bus de'i mkhas par rlom pa nyid de sel bar byed do //
translated: but we dispel your conceit about your knowledge with these words.

original: khyod ni des 'jig rten slu bar byed de /
analyzed: khyod ni des 'jig rten slu bar byed de /
translated: You deceive the world with that.

original: de bsal bas 'jig rten yongs su bskyangs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bsal bas 'jig rten yongs su bskyangs par 'gyur ro //
translated: We protect the world by dispelling it.

original: gang gi tshe 'jig rten dang lhan cig smra ba de'i tshe na ni 'jig rten gyi rtogs pa ma bsal bar 'jig rten pa'i dngos po la tha snyad du byed de /
analyzed: gang gi tshe 'jig rten dang lhan cig smra ba de'i tshe na ni 'jig rten gyi rtogs pa ma bsal bar 'jig rten pa'i dngos po la tha snyad du byed de /
translated: When we speak in accordance with the world, then without dispelling the understanding of the world, we use conventions about worldly things.

original: bdag dang 'jig rten la ni 'jig rten pa'i don la tshig tha dad pa'am blo tha dad pa med la /
analyzed: bdag dang 'jig rten la ni 'jig rten pa'i don la tshig tha dad pa'am blo tha dad pa med la /
translated: For the world and ourselves, there is no difference in words or thought with regard to worldly objects.

original: khyod ni rang gi blos phyin ci log tu rtogs pas bslus la /
analyzed: khyod ni rang gi blos phyin ci log tu rtogs pas bslus la /
translated: But you are deceived by your own mistaken understanding,

original: rjes su dpag pas gtsor byed cing bdag nyid mkhas par khas 'ches nas 'jug pas kho bos de mi bzod do //
analyzed: rjes su dpag pas gtsor byed cing bdag nyid mkhas par khas 'ches nas 'jug pas kho bos de mi bzod do //
translated: and you engage in debate, making inference your main practice, and claiming to be wise. I cannot tolerate that!

original: khyod ji lta ba de bzhin du grub pa'i mtha' gzhan gyis bslus shing mkhas par rlom pa gzhan rnams kyang yin pas thams cad kyang bdag gis dgag par bya'o //
analyzed: khyod ji lta ba de bzhin du grub pa'i mtha' gzhan gyis bslus shing mkhas par rlom pa gzhan rnams kyang yin pas thams cad kyang bdag gis dgag par bya'o //
translated: Just as you are, so are others who are deceived by other philosophical systems and who boast of their wisdom. I will refute them all.

original: rjes su dpag pas gtso bor gyur pa 'di la ni mi 'dod pa mang por 'gyur te /
analyzed: rjes su dpag pas gtso bor gyur pa 'di la ni mi 'dod pa mang por 'gyur te /
translated: In this system, which makes inference its main practice, there are many unwanted consequences.

original: ma la sogs pa dag kyang 'di'i bgrod bya ma yin par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: ma la sogs pa dag kyang 'di'i bgrod bya ma yin par mi 'gyur te /
translated: One‚Äôs mother and so on would not be objects of sexual intercourse for him,

original: bud med nyid kyi phyir rang gi chung ma bzhin no //
analyzed: bud med nyid kyi phyir rang gi chung ma bzhin no //
translated: because they are women, just like one‚Äôs own wife.

original: de bzhin du 'di'i ltar na rig byed kyi sgra yang rtag pa dang ma byas pa dang rang 'byung dang tshad mar mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: de bzhin du 'di'i ltar na rig byed kyi sgra yang rtag pa dang ma byas pa dang rang 'byung dang tshad mar mi 'gyur te /
translated: Likewise, according to this system, the sound of the Vedas would not be permanent, uncreated, self-arisen, or valid cognition,

original: sgra nyid yin pa'i phyir smyon pa'i sgra bzhin no //
analyzed: sgra nyid yin pa'i phyir smyon pa'i sgra bzhin no //
translated: because it is sound, like the sound of a madman.

original: 'di ni bram zer yang mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'di ni bram zer yang mi 'gyur te /
translated: And he would not be a Brahmin,

original: lag pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa nyid kyi phyir nya pa la sogs pa bzhin no zhes 'di'i mngon par 'dod pa thams cad nyams par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lag pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa nyid kyi phyir nya pa la sogs pa bzhin no zhes 'di'i mngon par 'dod pa thams cad nyams par 'gyur ro //
translated: because he possesses hands and so on, like a fisherman. Thus all his assertions would be undermined.

original: 'dis 'jig rten gyi gnod pa gzhug par yang mi nus te /
analyzed: 'dis 'jig rten gyi gnod pa gzhug par yang mi nus te /
translated: He cannot even introduce the refutation of the world,

original: 'jig rten gyi mthong ba tshad ma nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir la /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi mthong ba tshad ma nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir la /
translated: because it would follow that worldly seeing would be valid cognition,

original: 'jig rten dang 'gal ba'i don smra ba tshad ma ma yin pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'jig rten dang 'gal ba'i don smra ba tshad ma ma yin pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: and because it would follow that the one who speaks of a meaning that contradicts the world would not be valid.

original: nas dang til dang s'a lu la sogs pa dag ltar rgyu'i khyad par las 'bras bu'i khyad par khas len pas 'gro ba'i bla ma de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid khas blang bar nus pa nyid do //
analyzed: nas dang til dang s'a lu la sogs pa dag ltar rgyu'i khyad par las 'bras bu'i khyad par khas len pas 'gro ba'i bla ma de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid khas blang bar nus pa nyid do //
translated: Since we accept that a difference in the effect is due to a difference in the cause, just as barley, sesame, rice, and so on, are different, we can accept the inconceivable power of the TathƒÅgatas, the supreme beings in the world.üîΩThus:

original: 'di ltar / phul 'gro las tshes phul 'gro ba //
analyzed: 'di ltar / phul 'gro las tshes phul 'gro ba //
translated: The supreme goer goes to the supreme place.

original: 'ga' zhig 'jig rten 'dir yang snang //üîΩdes na bsam mi khyab mthu yang //
analyzed: 'ga' zhig 'jig rten 'dir yang snang // des na bsam mi khyab mthu yang //
translated: Some appear in this world.üîΩTherefore you should understand that

original: nges par yod ces rtogs par gyis //
analyzed: nges par yod ces rtogs par gyis //
translated: the inconceivable power definitely exists.

original: rigs kyi phul du byung ba bram ze la thug pa dang skye @105b ba'i gnas kyi phul du byung ba 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched la thug pa dang / ri'i phul du byung ba lhun po la thug pa dang / rgyal po'i phul du byung ba 'khor los sgyur ba la thug pa ji lta ba de bzhin du shes pa'i phul du byung ba yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi mthar thug pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rigs kyi phul du byung ba bram ze la thug pa dang skye @105b ba'i gnas kyi phul du byung ba 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched la thug pa dang / ri'i phul du byung ba lhun po la thug pa dang / rgyal po'i phul du byung ba 'khor los sgyur ba la thug pa ji lta ba de bzhin du shes pa'i phul du byung ba yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi mthar thug pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Just as the best of the castes is the Brahmin, the best of the abodes of sentient beings is the sphere of neither perception nor non-perception, the best of the mountains is Mount Meru, and the best of the kings is the universal monarch, in the same way, the best of the consciousnesses is the final culmination of the gnosis of omniscience.

original: de'i phyir phun sum tshogs pa dag gi khyad par gyi gnas skabs mthong ba'i phyir 'di yang phul du byung ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar srid de /
analyzed: de'i phyir phun sum tshogs pa dag gi khyad par gyi gnas skabs mthong ba'i phyir 'di yang phul du byung ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar srid de /
translated: Therefore, because the state of excellence is seen, it is possible to say that this is endowed with excellence.

original: rgyu yang dag par sbyar ba dag gis rang dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa nye bar skyed par byed do zhes bya ba 'di ni byis pa'i bar la rab tu grags so //
analyzed: rgyu yang dag par sbyar ba dag gis rang dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa nye bar skyed par byed do zhes bya ba 'di ni byis pa'i bar la rab tu grags so //
translated: The cause, when it is applied correctly, generates the perfect result that is in accordance with itself. This is well known even to fools.

original: rgyu ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'byor ba shin tu rgya che zhing nyams par rtogs pa med pa yin la /
analyzed: rgyu ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'byor ba shin tu rgya che zhing nyams par rtogs pa med pa yin la /
translated: The cause is the bodhisattvas‚Äô vast and inexhaustible mastery.

original: 'bras bu yang de dang rjes su mthun pa de bzhin gshegs pa yin pas 'gro ba'i bla ma rnams kyi yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'byor pa rgya chen po srid do //
analyzed: 'bras bu yang de dang rjes su mthun pa de bzhin gshegs pa yin pas 'gro ba'i bla ma rnams kyi yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'byor pa rgya chen po srid do //
translated: The result is the Tathagata, who is in accordance with that. Therefore, it is possible for the spiritual benefactors of the world to have the vast and inconceivable mastery of good qualities.

original: 'bru mar gyi bum pa brgya nye bar sbyor ba la dge sbyong gi rkyen bzhin no //
analyzed: 'bru mar gyi bum pa brgya nye bar sbyor ba la dge sbyong gi rkyen bzhin no //
translated: It is like the application of the hundred oil-filled jars.

original: dge slong mkhas pa 'ga' zhig gnas kyi ched du dbul po zhig gi khyim du zhugs la /
analyzed: dge slong mkhas pa 'ga' zhig gnas kyi ched du dbul po zhig gi khyim du zhugs la /
translated: A certain wise monk entered the house of a poor man for the sake of a residence.

original: dbul po des kyang de la rkang pa bsku ba'i 'bru mar dang mal cha bstabs par gyur to //
analyzed: dbul po des kyang de la rkang pa bsku ba'i 'bru mar dang mal cha bstabs par gyur to //
translated: The poor man offered him oil for anointing his feet and a bed.

original: de nas gang zhig yul der yul dpon du gyur pa des dge slong de 'ongs so zhes thos par gyur pa dang / des dge slong de'i gan du 'ongs nas ci bgyi bka' stsol cig ces dge slong de la gus pas gsol ba btab bo //
analyzed: de nas gang zhig yul der yul dpon du gyur pa des dge slong de 'ongs so zhes thos par gyur pa dang / des dge slong de'i gan du 'ongs nas ci bgyi bka' stsol cig ces dge slong de la gus pas gsol ba btab bo //
translated: He approached the monk and respectfully requested the monk, ‚ÄúPlease tell me what I should do.‚Äù

original: dge slong des gang gi khyim du kho bos mtshan mo gnas bcas pa'i skyes bu 'di la 'bru mar bum pa brgya byin cig ces smras la /
analyzed: dge slong des gang gi khyim du kho bos mtshan mo gnas bcas pa'i skyes bu 'di la 'bru mar bum pa brgya byin cig ces smras la /
translated: The monk said to him, ‚ÄúGive a hundred jars of oil to the man in whose house I spent the night.‚Äù

original: des kyang de bzhin du byas te de ltar na 'jig rten na phul du 'gro ba pas ches phul du 'gro ba mthong ngo //
analyzed: des kyang de bzhin du byas te de ltar na 'jig rten na phul du 'gro ba pas ches phul du 'gro ba mthong ngo //
translated: He did just that. Thus, one who is superior sees someone who is even more superior.

original: rjes su dpag pa 'dis ni gang zhig bsam gyis mi khyab pa mthu'i stobs khyad par du gyur pa de 'ga' zhig yod do zhes bya bar rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa 'dis ni gang zhig bsam gyis mi khyab pa mthu'i stobs khyad par du gyur pa de 'ga' zhig yod do zhes bya bar rtogs par bya'o //
translated: By this inference, it should be understood that there are some beings who have inconceivable power and strength.

original: 'dir bshad pa /
analyzed: 'dir bshad pa /
translated: Here we say:

original: mngon sum min don gang de dag / mngon sum don gyis rtogs bya de //
analyzed: mngon sum min don gang de dag / mngon sum don gyis rtogs bya de //
translated: The object of nonperception is understood by the object of perception.

original: med ces bya bar brjod min te //
analyzed: med ces bya bar brjod min te //
translated: It is not said to be nonexistent.

original: che kun che rnams la 'gyur ro //
analyzed: che kun che rnams la 'gyur ro //
translated: The great ones are frightened by the great.
Here,

original: smras pa / yang ci'i phyir sems can 'di dag phal cher theg pa chen po la skrag cing /
analyzed: smras pa / yang ci'i phyir sems can 'di dag phal cher theg pa chen po la skrag cing /
translated: it is said: Why are these sentient beings mostly frightened by the Great Vehicle and

original: ji skad bshad pa'i mthu'i khyad par la yang mi gus par 'gyur /
analyzed: ji skad bshad pa'i mthu'i khyad par la yang mi gus par 'gyur /
translated: do not respect the special powers as they have been explained?

original: skrag pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: skrag pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they are frightened.
